title: Private Capital Titans Rush to Defend Software Companies as AI Rout Deepens
description: High finance’s new ultra-rich lined up one by one, in TV spots, earnings calls and LinkedIn posts, to make the same pitch: Don’t take out big AI fears on private credit funds.
content: High finance’s new ultra-rich lined up one by one, in TV spots, earnings calls and LinkedIn posts, to make the same pitch: Don’t take out big AI fears on private credit funds.
